title: Lithium-base battery diaphragm and preparation method

events.title: Application filed by GM Global Technology Operations LLC

classifications.description: Manufacturing processes of separators, membranes or diaphragms
Synthetic resins, e.g. thermoplastics or thermosetting resins
Separators, membranes or diaphragms characterised by the material having a layered structure

abstract: Lithium-based battery separators include porous polymer membranes with opposing surfaces. A porous carbon coating is formed on one of the opposing surfaces of the porous polymer membrane. The polycations enter the porous carbon coating, the porous polymer membrane, or both the porous carbon coating and the porous polymer membrane.
abstract_original: 锂基电池隔膜包括具有相对表面的多孔聚合物膜。在多孔聚合物膜的相对表面之一上形成多孔碳涂层。聚阳离子进入多孔碳涂层中、多孔聚合物膜中，或多孔碳涂层和多孔聚合物膜两者中。
claims:
1.锂基电池隔膜，其包括：1. A lithium-based battery separator, comprising:
      
      
         具有相对表面的多孔聚合物膜；a porous polymer membrane having opposing surfaces;
      
      
         在多孔聚合物膜的相对表面之一上形成的多孔碳涂层；和a porous carbon coating formed on one of the opposing surfaces of the porous polymer membrane; and
      
      
         引入该多孔碳涂层、多孔聚合物膜或多孔碳涂层和多孔聚合物膜两者中的聚阳离子材料。The polycationic material incorporated into the porous carbon coating, porous polymer membrane, or both porous carbon coating and porous polymer membrane.

2.如权利要求1中限定的锂基电池隔膜，其中聚阳离子材料引入多孔聚合物膜和具有朝该多孔聚合物膜的另一相对表面方向增加的梯度分布。2. A lithium-based battery separator as defined in claim 1, wherein the polycationic material is incorporated into the porous polymer membrane and has a gradient distribution increasing towards the other opposite surface of the porous polymer membrane.

3.如权利要求1中限定的锂基电池隔膜，其中聚阳离子材料引入多孔碳涂层和具有朝多孔聚合物膜的相对表面所述之一方向增加的梯度分布。3. A lithium-based battery separator as defined in claim 1, wherein the polycation material is incorporated into the porous carbon coating and has a gradient profile increasing towards said one of the opposing surfaces of the porous polymer membrane.

4.如权利要求1中限定的锂基电池隔膜，其中聚阳离子材料具有下列结构：4. A lithium-based battery separator as defined in claim 1, wherein the polycation material has the following structure:
      
      
        
          
            
          
          
        
      
      
         其中TFSI- X是双(三氟甲磺酰基)酰亚胺阴离子，x为100-100,000，和n为100-100,000。wherein TFSI - X is a bis(trifluoromethanesulfonyl)imide anion, x is 100-100,000, and n is 100-100,000.

5.一种制备锂基电池隔膜的方法，该方法包括：5. A method for preparing a lithium-based battery diaphragm, the method comprising:
      
      
         在多孔聚合物膜的两个相对表面之一上浇注料浆，所述料浆包括多孔碳颗粒和聚阳离子材料；和casting a slurry on one of the two opposing surfaces of the porous polymer membrane, the slurry comprising porous carbon particles and a polycationic material; and
      
      
         将浇注的料浆暴露于干燥处理，从而形成i)在多孔聚合物膜的两个相对表面之一上的多孔碳涂层、和ii)在多孔碳涂层中、在多孔聚合物膜中、或在多孔碳涂层和多孔聚合物膜两者中的聚阳离子材料的梯度分布。exposing the cast slurry to a drying process to form i) a porous carbon coating on one of the two opposing surfaces of the porous polymer membrane, and ii) in the porous carbon coating, in the porous polymer membrane, Or a gradient distribution of polycationic material in both the porous carbon coating and the porous polymer membrane.

6.如权利要求5中限定的方法，其中在浇注料浆之前，所述方法进一步包括制备聚阳离子材料溶液和将多孔碳颗粒添加到所述聚阳离子材料溶液。6. The method as defined in claim 5, wherein prior to casting the slip, the method further comprises preparing a polycationic material solution and adding porous carbon particles to the polycationic material solution.

7.如权利要求6中限定的方法，进一步包括通过以下方式制备所述聚阳离子材料溶液：7. The method as defined in claim 6, further comprising preparing said polycationic material solution by:
      
      
         使用双(三氟甲磺酰基)酰亚胺甲醇溶液滴定聚亚乙基亚胺水溶液到pH7，从而在水和甲醇中形成聚阳离子材料；Titrating an aqueous solution of polyethyleneimine to pH 7 using a methanolic bis(trifluoromethanesulfonyl)imide solution to form a polycationic material in water and methanol;
      
      
         除去水和甲醇；和removal of water and methanol; and
      
      
         将所述聚阳离子材料溶解在有机溶剂中。The polycationic material is dissolved in an organic solvent.

8.如权利要求6中限定的方法，进一步包括通过在惰性气氛中将碳前体暴露在预定的温度下从而碳化所述碳前体来制备多孔碳颗粒。8. The method as defined in claim 6, further comprising preparing porous carbon particles by carbonizing the carbon precursor by exposing the carbon precursor to a predetermined temperature in an inert atmosphere.
9.如权利要求8中限定的方法，其中所述碳前体是金属有机骨架-5。9. A method as defined in claim 8, wherein the carbon precursor is a metal organic framework-5.
10.如权利要求6中限定的方法，其中所述干燥处理在大约25℃下进行大约24小时。10. The method as defined in claim 6, wherein said drying treatment is performed at about 25°C for about 24 hours.
12.如权利要求11中限定的锂基电池，其中所述锂基电池是锂-硫电池。12. A lithium-based battery as defined in claim 11, wherein said lithium-based battery is a lithium-sulfur battery.
13.如权利要求11中限定的锂基电池，其中所述锂基电池是锂离子电池。13. A lithium-based battery as defined in claim 11, wherein said lithium-based battery is a lithium-ion battery.

14.如权利要求11中限定的锂基电池，其中聚阳离子材料引入多孔聚合物膜和具有朝该多孔聚合物膜的另一相对表面方向增加的梯度分布。14. A lithium-based battery as defined in claim 11, wherein the polycation material is incorporated into the porous polymer membrane and has a gradient distribution increasing towards the other opposing surface of the porous polymer membrane.

15.如权利要求11中限定的锂基电池，其中聚阳离子材料引入多孔碳涂层和具有朝该多孔聚合物膜的相对表面所述之一方向增加的梯度分布。15. A lithium based battery as defined in claim 11, wherein the polycationic material is incorporated into the porous carbon coating and has a gradient profile increasing towards said one of the opposing surfaces of the porous polymer membrane.

16.如权利要求11中限定的锂基电池，其中聚阳离子材料具有下列结构：16. A lithium-based battery as defined in claim 11, wherein the polycation material has the following structure:
      
      
        
          
            
          
          
        
      
      
         其中TFSI- X是双(三氟甲磺酰基)酰亚胺阴离子，x为100-100,000，和n为100-100,000。wherein TFSI - X is a bis(trifluoromethanesulfonyl)imide anion, x is 100-100,000, and n is 100-100,000.
